main event: A bright silver round object was observed in the sky over San Augustine, Texas.
interesting points: The object was noted to move directly overhead before picking up speed and disappearing on the horizon., The observation was recorded by the Unit Command Post., The report indicated that the observer's television video malfunctioned during the sighting., There was no physical evidence or photographs associated with this sighting., The observation took place on 20 October 1966.
witness description: The observer was located outside his home during the sighting.
